name: European Security Transport Association
goal: Representing the cash industry in the EU and in its member states.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Transport
euInitiatives: Cash in transit issues and regulation; cash processing, internal market issues related to cash; cash policies (notes and coins emissions, legal tender, anti-counterfeiting etc.), cash payment limitations
